00009 #include "../Events/handle_requests_event.h"
00010 #include "../Views/view.h"
00011 #include "../Views/abstract_view_factory.h"
00012 
00013 RobotControl::RobotControl(boost::shared_ptr<AbstractViewFactory> view_factory, std::size_t history_length, const WorldInformation& initial_world_information)
00014                            : view_factory_(view_factory), view_buffer_(history_length) {
00015     boost::shared_ptr<View> view(view_factory_->create_new_view_instance(initial_world_information));
00016     view_buffer_.push_back(view);
00017 }
00018 
00019 RobotControl::~RobotControl() {
00020 
00021 }
00022 
00023 void RobotControl::update(const WorldInformation& world_information) {
00024     boost::shared_ptr<View> view(view_factory_->create_new_view_instance(world_information));
00025     view_buffer_.push_back(view);
00026 }
00027 
00028 std::set<boost::shared_ptr<Request> > RobotControl::compute_new_request(Robot& robot) {
00029     return robot.compute();
00030 }
00031 
00032 void RobotControl::compute_view(Robot& robot) {
00033     robot.set_view(boost::weak_ptr<View>(view_buffer_.back()));
00034 }
00035 
00036 void RobotControl::set_view_facotry(const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractViewFactory>& view_factory) {
00037     view_factory_ = view_factory;
00038 }
